SectionBody.Text: A notice to a current insurer of a replacement of a current life insurance policy is not required in a transaction involving:

Subsection.Text: An application to the current insurer that issued the current policy or contract when a contractual change or conversion privilege is being exercised;
A current policy or contract that is being replaced by the same insurer pursuant to a program filed with and approved by the office; or
A term conversion privilege that is being exercised among corporate affiliates.
